meanings.definition: A person who plays the fiddle.
meanings.sent1: The fiddlers at the concert played beautiful music.
meanings.sent2: She became a skilled fiddler after years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The fiddlers in the band wore matching outfits and hats.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced on the strings like expert fiddlers.
meanings.sent5: The young fiddlers in the orchestra added a lively touch to the performance.

meanings.definition: A person who cheats or manipulates something, especially in a small or petty way.
meanings.sent1: The fiddlers in the game tried to change the rules secretly.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a fiddler who altered the numbers in his favor.
meanings.sent3: The fiddlers at the card table were caught red-handed.
meanings.sent4: She was a master fiddler, always finding loopholes in the system.
meanings.sent5: The fiddlers in the office were clever at bending the rules without getting caught.
